explanation: [0-0] Against a gradient dark blue background, four children are sitting around a table. On the left is a child wearing yellow clothes and a child wearing a yellow top with a red checkered tie. On the right is a child wearing red clothes and a child wearing green clothes. In the middle is a small round table covered with a blue striped tablecloth, on which there is a chocolate donut-shaped cake with a lit candle on it. The child in red clothes turns his head to the right, closes his eyes, and holds a blue doll in his left hand. The other three children are all facing the cake, their mouths wide open with laughter.

[0-7] First, the child in yellow clothes, the child with the red checkered tie, and the child in green clothes clap their hands, their mouths wide open with laughter. The child in red clothes opens his eyes, turns his head towards the candle on the cake and blows it out. Then he turns his head to the right again. The other three children all open their eyes wide, look at the candle, clap their hands, and laugh with their mouths wide open. The candle on the cake goes out and then lights up again. The four of them open their eyes wide and look at the candle. The child in red clothes blows at the candle three times in a row, constantly spitting on the face of the child in yellow clothes opposite him. The child in yellow clothes frowns and closes his eyes. The child in red clothes finishes blowing out the candle, turns to the front, his face flushed, sticking out his tongue and panting. The child in yellow clothes wipes his face with his left hand. The child with the red checkered tie next to him looks at the child in yellow clothes and smiles awkwardly. At this time, the extinguished candle is lit again.

[7-12] Then the four children stare at the candle with wide eyes. Then the child in green clothes blows hard at the candle, blowing the chocolate donut on the cake onto the face of the child in yellow clothes. The child in yellow clothes, his face covered with the chocolate donut, leans back and falls to the ground with his chair. The other three children all stare with wide eyes. At this time, the extinguished candle is lit again. The child in red clothes waves the doll in his hand. The child in green clothes looks down at the doll. The child in yellow clothes also sits up and looks, his face still covered with the chocolate donut.
